timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: Pls remove this checking since it is already verified by org.prebid.server.validation.RequestValidator so no need to do it in each bidder.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
Seems we need to rename method name to impExtToImps(..).
We don't need to pass whole BidRequest object as method argument here since we use only request.getImp().
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: Since this method is called, no reason to check banner != null
timeline.author: rpanchyk
rpanchyk
rpanchyk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+adapters:
+  lunamedia:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: http://api.lunamedia.io/xp/get?pubid=
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true
+    pbs-enforces-ccpa: true
+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: josh@lunamedia.io
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      site-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      supported-vendors:
+      vendor-id: 0
+    usersync:
+      url: https://api.lunamedia.io/xp/user-sync?redirect=
+      redirect-url: /setuid?bidder=lunamedia&gdpr={{gdpr}}&gdpr_consent={{gdpr_consent}}&uid=$UID

timeline.bodyText: It not strongly required to name the field camel case,  pubid if fine. So no annotation will be needed.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: Fix bidder name or remove the comment.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: We don't need currency anymore here.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: PLs change the type to iframe according to Go config.
timeline.author: rpanchyk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+adapters:
+  lunamedia:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: http://api.lunamedia.io/xp/get?pubid=
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true
+    pbs-enforces-ccpa: true
+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: josh@lunamedia.io
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      site-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      supported-vendors:
+      vendor-id: 0
+    usersync:
+      url: https://api.lunamedia.io/xp/user-sync?redirect=
+      redirect-url: /setuid?bidder=lunamedia&gdpr={{gdpr}}&gdpr_consent={{gdpr_consent}}&uid=$UID
+      cookie-family-name: lunamedia
+      type: redirect
